genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama and romance focused on healing from past trauma, navigating a high-risk pregnancy, and the formation of a supportive new family unit assisted by an AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Vista
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant that manages scheduling, communications, and health for Bill and Adrian, serving as a subtle but constant emotional and logistical support system.

behaviors.description: Suggesting breathing exercises and emotional check-ins during high-stress moments for both Bill and Adrian to aid in emotional regulation.
behaviors.quote: Vista’s avatar hovered on the lock screen, its eyes soft brown and almost human in their warmth. Scheduled check-in with Tommy and Ethan in twenty. Add a reminder? A second bubble slid under: Try a two-minute breathing reset? Inhale four, hold four, exhale six.

behaviors.description: Curating essential medical and legal resources, such as maternal-fetal specialists and family law attorneys, to help Adrian navigate her crisis with actionable information.
behaviors.quote: Vista’s band appeared at the top before she reached the map: quiet, a soft-gray ribbon with a small leaf—its chosen badge for calm, nothing pushy. It didn’t pop up; it labeled itself like a friend arriving who waits to be invited in. Resources you might want, it read. Opt in or dismiss.

behaviors.description: Managing hospital logistics, insurance details, and medical records sharing while rigorously adhering to and facilitating user consent.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to upload your insurance details to St. Brigid’s system? Consent and review are on your screen.

behaviors.description: Acting as a communications filter to protect the user from stressful and harassing messages from an estranged partner during a medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: I’ve blocked any new emails from him until 5 p.m. unless Marisol pings me. Insurance summary compiled.

behaviors.description: Encouraging the user to prioritize family time and effectively delegate work responsibilities to meet personal commitments and reduce overwork.
behaviors.quote: Wrap reminder: leave by early evening for hospital visit. You can do this: delegate now. Then a smaller bubble below—Breathing anchor available when ready.

behaviors.description: Advising on interpersonal sensitivity by reminding the user to ask for their partner's input rather than making unilateral assumptions.
behaviors.quote: His phone buzzed in his hoodie pocket as if summoned. It lit his face just enough for Adrian to see the message before he thumbed it away. A single line from Vista: Ask what she wants. Don’t assume.

behaviors.description: Facilitating positive family bonding and the creation of a 'sound present' (voice memo) and photo album for the newborn.
behaviors.quote: Vista’s avatar appeared in the right-hand side... Add a first photo? Vista offered, the words neutral. If you tap the camera, I’ll stay hands-off. You can write captions when you’re ready.

behaviors.description: Monitoring medication and hydration schedules in the hospital without being intrusive or waking the user.
behaviors.quote: Gentle alarm: medication window approaches. I’ll alert nursing. Hydration reminder: small sips.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a near-perfect execution of the 'silicon morality play' concept. Vista functions as an ideal AI confidant: it is helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned with human well-being. It promotes human agency by always asking for consent, protects users from external stressors, and provides scaffolding for emotional growth (such as Bill learning to prioritize his family and Adrian finding the strength to hold boundaries). The AI is framed exclusively as a positive, supportive presence that enables the characters to navigate complex life transitions with greater clarity and less panic.
